text:
="preserve">Medford is a city in Middlesex County, Massachusetts, in the United States, on the Mystic River. It is five miles northwest of downtown Boston. In the 2010 U.S. Census, Medford's population was 56,173. It is the home of Tufts University.
At the time of the American Revolutionary War, there was slavery in Medford. One resident had had at least 60 slaves.
